import React , { Component } from 'react' class ServiceDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ Amt: 0, SerPer: '', CName: '', TipVal: 0 } } ChangeAmt = (event) => this.setstate({Amt: event.target.value}) ChangeSerPer = (event) => this.setstate({SerPer: event.target.value}) TipCal = (event) => Amt*isnull(SerPer,0) render () { return (
Enter your bill amount Rs.

How was the service ?

Tip Amount :Rs

) } } export default ServiceDetails;
